ygData.subject: Re: battle drum?
ygData.msgSnippet: You should have no problems completing any quest at all.  Last night I discovered that you can complete any quest you want.  Any class any race any quest.
ygData.messageBody:
You should have no problems completing any quest at all. Last night I
discovered that you can complete any quest you want. Any class any race any
quest. That is what the level 11 song is useful for. I succesfully got a quest
from a high elf who would not give it to me if until I played the carillion at
him and then talked to him.
Penaden Songweaver
http://www.lostorder.com

Doug Donaldson wrote:

> From: Doug Donaldson <doug@...>
>
> At 07:07 PM 07/06/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
> >
> >On the same type of thread, yesterday I picked up 2 Illegible Cantrips from
> >some orcs we slew. What exactly are they, I tried to sell them but to no
> >avail.
>
> The illegible cantrips are part of a quest involving an NPC wizard (I
> think..) found on the lower floor of the building at the entrance to the
> enchanter/wizard/magician area in Freeport. Forgive the lack of detail but
> it was awhile ago that I attempted to complete the quest (without success
> due to my class). The building is the one you must teleport into by using
> the teleport pad just outside of it. It is the compound area with the 2
> magic users casting outside the "gate" of it.
>
> Twen - Bard - The Rathe
>

> ONElist: the best source for group communications.
> http://www.onelist.com
